package.name: AdiumyStatusIcons
package.description: An Adium contactlist style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long: Author: "The new Adium icons were out for a while, so I decided to revamp my older Adiumy Status Icons (now renamed to Adiumy Status Icons Classic)." This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=4236
